name: Death Roll (Pixel Raven)
description:
Death Roll Description

Face an evil oracle in a game of chance! Can your dice skills save the people from this magic menace?

Roll the dice! Check what the oracle has managed and try to predict your next roll, beat the oracle at its own game!

But be careful! There are lives at risk! Fail and you will have to watch the horror unfold.

Controls

Left click to make a choice

P to open options in-game

Credits

Jimmy - Project Manager, 3D Models, Textures

Joseph - Gameplay Programmer, Character Models, Animations, Voice

Stephen - Gameplay Programmer

Rui - Gameplay Programmer, Particle Effects, 3D Models
